<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_58872_needit_needit</collection><condition>(current.short_description.nil())</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Async BR</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	current.short_description='Test short desc set using async BR';
	current.update();

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>narendranath.reddy</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-06-26 07:13:42</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ff0bef1f97eb6d1081a6bb46f053af27</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Async BR</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_ff0bef1f97eb6d1081a6bb46f053af27</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>narendranath.reddy</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-06-26 07:14:39</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=ff0bef1f97eb6d1081a6bb46f053af27"/></record_update>
